publishingInfo1: AidStream required your organisation's Publisher ID and API key to be able to publish your data to the IATI registry.
publishingInfo2: The publishing type is “Unsegmented” by default.All the activities will be published in a single file to the IATI registry.
publishingInfo3: By default, when you update your data, the changes are not automatically reflected on the IATI registry. Select “Yes” to let AidStream automatically update your data on the registry.
activityElementsChecklist: On AidStream some of the elements are required for an activity. These elements are checked in the list below and disabled. You can always check other elements to add their information in your activities.
defaultValues: These default values are used throughout  the AidStream for your organisation and activities information.
updateAndGo: Update and go to next step
